original_title: Golden Anniversary of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
overview: In Disneyland, the Wicked Queen has cast a spell over the seven dwarfs that makes them feel they're too old and decide to retire, so Dick Van Dyke tries to convince them to stay. The show includes many celebrities sharing their Snow White memories and features a new performance of the deleted song "You're Never Too Old to Be Young".
title: Golden Anniversary of Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
